news.title: American wrestler Hulk Hogan dies at 71
news.summary: Hogan was widely regarded as the most recognised wrestler in the world.

news.title: Nick Drake The Making Of Five Leaves Left box set to be released tomorrow
news.summary: The Making Of Five Leaves Left will be out Friday.

news.title: Electric Picnic announces Mother After Dark lineup
news.summary: Electric Picnic takes place from the 29th-31st of August

news.title: KNEECAP respond to Hungary ban ahead of Sziget Festival performance
news.summary: "It's clear this is political distraction and a further attempt to silence those who call out genocide against the Palestinian people," KNEECAP said.

news.title: First trailer released for Giant starring Pierce Brosnan
Queens of the Stone Age and Foo Fighters episode of Hot Press Classics out now - feat. Dave Grohl
news.summary: In the feelgood podcast of the summer, Paul Nolan breaks down a brace of Queens Of The Stone Age masterpieces, 2000’s Rated R and 02’s Songs For The Deaf, before turning his attention to Foo Fighters’ 1997 classic, The Colour And The Shape.

news.title: Hungary bans KNEECAP from entry ahead of festival gig
news.summary: "This is an unprecedented move which we believe is both unnecessary and regrettable," Sziget Festival said.

news.title: Dreaming Of You: The Making of The Coral to screen at Dublin cinema
Bikôkô: “When I was a teenager, I was obsessed with  R’n’B and neo soul artists like Erykah Badu, Outkast and D’Angelo – all the  good stuff!”
news.summary: Stuart Clark meets Barcelona neo-soulster Bikôkô, who draws inspiration from her African heritage.

news.title: Michael D. Higgins releases music video for 'Against All Certainty', starring Ciaran Hinds, Olwen Fouéré, Eanna Hardwicke
news.summary: The full Against All Certainty album, featuring ten original works by President Higgins, will be released on September 5.
